products.name: Cash ISA
products.description: A tax-free savings account that allows you to save and invest up to a certain limit each year.

products.name: Lifetime ISA
products.description: A government-backed savings account that helps you save for your first home or retirement.

products.name: 32 Day Notice Account
products.description: Earn interest on your savings with a 32-day notice period for withdrawals.

products.name: 95 Day Notice Account
products.description: Earn higher interest with a 95-day notice period for withdrawals.

products.name: Lifetime ISA
products.description: A government-backed savings account that helps you save for your first home or retirement.

products.name: Personal Pension
products.description: A long-term savings plan to help you prepare for retirement.
